update.foreach:
update scoreflow
MSerialNo = #{flow.mserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ScoredCode = #{flow.scoredcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.insert:
insert into scoreflow (SerialNo,MSerialNo, ScoredCode, ScorringCode, ScoreDate, ScoreType, State, Score, Ratio,dbtype,ScoreState) values
(#{flow.serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flow.mserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flow.scoredcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flow.scorringcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flow.scoredate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{flow.scoretype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flow.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flow.score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{flow.ratio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{flow.dbtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flow.scoreState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SerialNo,Score from scoreflow where MSerialNo=#{mserialno} and ScorringCode=#{scorringcode} and dbtype=#{dbtype}
SELECT Sum(Score)/ COUNT(*) as typeAvgScore from scoreflow WHERE MSerialNo = #{mserialno} AND ScoreType=#{scoretype} and dbtype=#{dbtype}
select count(*) from scoreflow where MSerialNo like concat(#{mserialno},'%') and ScorringCode =#{scorringcode} and dbtype=#{dbtype}
select * from scoreflow where ScoredCode=#{usercode} or ScorringCode=#{usercode} and dbtype=#{dbtype}
SELECT sf.* FROM monthsummary m, scoreflow sf where m.SerialNo = sf.MSerialNo AND m.dbtype = sf.dbtype AND m.Year = #{year} AND m.Month = #{month} AND m.dbtype=#{dbtype}
